languages.text: "Я отвергаю всех прочих покровителей и присягаю в извечной верности Великому Светочу, истинному богу и вершителю судеб. Я смиренно молю вас помочь мне утопить Футфол в крови Инцедии Чорда и ее приспешников". {n}Владайм выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я отвергаю ложного бога и присягаю в извечной верности вам, {name} фон Валанциус, и силам, даровавших вам свое покровительство. Я смиренно молю вас помочь мне утопить Футфол в крови Инцедии Чорда и ее приспешников". {n}Владайм выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я отвергаю всех прочих покровителей и присягаю в извечной верности Великому Светочу, истинному богу и вершителю судеб. Я смиренно молю вас помочь мне утопить Футфол в крови Инцедии Чорда и ее приспешников". {n}Владайм выжидающе смотрит на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I renounce the false god and pledge my eternal fealty to you, {name} von Valancius, and to the forces that have given you patronage. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我在此宣布，我放弃所有其它赞助人，永远忠于至高明光，这世上真正的{mf|神明|女神}，命运的{mf|主人|女主人}。我谦卑地恳求您，帮我杀死因森蒂娅·库尔达与她的所有爪牙，用他们的鲜血清洗落脚港。”{n}弗拉迪姆面露期待地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在此宣布，我放弃所有其它赞助人，永远忠于至高明光，这世上真正的{mf|神明|女神}，命运的{mf|主人|女主人}。我谦卑地恳求您，帮我杀死因森蒂娅·库尔达与她的所有爪牙，用他们得鲜血清洗落脚港。”{n}弗拉迪姆面露期待地看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私は守護聖人を全て放棄し、真の{mf|神|女神}であり運命の陛下である大いなる烽火に永遠の忠誠を誓います。フットフォールをインセンディア・チョーダとその手下たちの血で染めたいのです。その手助けを、どうか、お願い申し上げます」{n}ヴラダイムは期待の眼差しであなたを見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は守護聖人を全て放棄し、真の{mf|神|女神}であり運命の陛下である大いなる烽火に永遠の忠誠を誓います。フットフォールをインセンディア・チョーダとその手下たちの血で染めたいのです。その手助けを、どうか、お願い申し上げます」{n}ヴラダイムは期待の眼差しであなたを見つめた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Renuncio a todos los demás patrones y juro lealtad eterna {mf|al|a la} Gran Faro, {mf|el| la} verdader{mf|o|a} dios{mf||a} y maestr{mf|o|a} de los destinos. Le suplico que me ayude a ahogar a Paso en la sangre de Incendia Chorda y sus secuaces». {n}Vladaym te mira expectante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Renuncio a todos los demás patrones y juro lealtad eterna {mf|al|a la} Gran Faro, {mf|el| la} verdader{mf|o|a} dios{mf||a} y maestr{mf|o|a} de los destinos. Le suplico que me ayude a ahogar a Paso en la sangre de Incendia Chorda y sus secuaces». {n}Vladaym te mira expectante.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich widersage allen anderen Schutzherren und schwöre dem Großen Leuchtfeuer meine ewige Treue, {mf|dem wahren Gott|der wahren Göttin} und {mf|Meister|Meisterin} der Schicksale. Ich bitte Euch demütigst, mir zu helfen, Footfall im Blut von Incendia Chorda und ihren Schergen zu ertränken." {n}Vladaym sieht dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich widersage allen anderen Schutzherren und schwöre dem Großen Leuchtfeuer meine ewige Treue, {mf|dem wahren Gott|der wahren Göttin} und {mf|Meister|Meisterin} der Schicksale. Ich bitte Euch demütigst, mir zu helfen, Footfall im Blut von Incendia Chorda und ihren Schergen zu ertränken." {n}Vladaym sieht dich erwartungsvoll an.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je renonce à tous mes protecteurs et je jure fidélité éternelle {mf|au dieu vivant|à la déesse vivante}, guide suprême et {mf|maître|maîtresse} de la destinée. Je vous demande humblement de m'aider à noyer Castel dans le sang d'Incendia Chorda et de ses sbires, » {n}déclare Vladaym, puis il se tait en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je renonce à tous mes protecteurs et je jure fidélité éternelle {mf|au dieu vivant|à la déesse vivante}, guide suprême et {mf|maître|maîtresse} de la destinée. Je vous demande humblement de m'aider à noyer Castel dans le sang d'Incendia Chorda et de ses sbires, » {n}déclare Vladaym, puis il se tait en attendant votre réponse.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Diğer tüm hamilerden sarfınazar eder; Yüce Kılavuz'a, sahih ilaha ve kaderin efendisine ebediyen sadık kalacağıma ant içerim. Binliman'ı İncendia'nın ve ayak takımının kanıyla bulamam için muavenetinize muhtacım." {n}Vladaym, beklenti içinde sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I renounce all other patrons and pledge my eternal fealty to the Great Beacon, the true {mf|god|goddess} and {mf|master|mistress} of fates. I most humbly beseech you to help me drown Footfall in the blood of Incendia Chorda and her minions." {n}Vladaym looks at you expectantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diğer tüm hamilerden sarfınazar eder; Yüce Kılavuz'a, sahih ilaha ve kaderin efendisine ebedîyen sadık kalacağıma ant içerim. Binliman'ı İncendia'nın ve ayak takımının kanıyla bulamam için muavenetinize muhtacım." {n}Vladaym beklenti içinde sana bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
